definition: one's birth data for astrological purposes, combined from year, month, day, hour, heavenly trunk and earthly branch
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: I wrote my birth time on a piece of paper and handed it to the fortune-teller.
sentences.chinese: 我把生辰八字寫在一張紙上，交給了算命先生。
